meanings.definition: Extremely modern or advanced in style or design.
meanings.sent1: The new building had an ultramodern look with sleek lines and shiny surfaces.
meanings.sent2: The ultramodern smartphone features a large touchscreen and high-speed processor.
meanings.sent3: The ultramodern kitchen appliances made cooking feel like a futuristic experience.
meanings.sent4: Her ultramodern fashion sense was like stepping into a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent5: The ultramodern architecture of the museum left visitors in awe of its beauty.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the latest or most advanced technology or ideas.
meanings.sent1: The company prided itself on its ultramodern approach to sustainable energy.
meanings.sent2: Their ultramodern research facility was equipped with cutting-edge equipment.
meanings.sent3: The ultramodern robot vacuum cleaner seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: His ultramodern thinking pushed the boundaries of traditional concepts.
meanings.sent5: The ultramodern spacecraft was a marvel of human ingenuity and progress.
